name: 5 Vegas - Triple A - Robusto
additionalNotes: The Triple-A cigar is a beast of a cigar made by hand using all Cuban-seed long-fillers from Nicaragua inside a thick and juicy Pennsylvania Broadleaf wrapper triple-fermented to pitch-black perfection. Expect layers of flavor including but not limited to oak, leather, espresso, and toasty spices. Expect a gloriously full and rich experience you'll feel in the gut and love every minute of it.
